price: Kim Rasûl'e itaat ederse Allah'a itaat etmiş olur. Yüz çevirene gelince, seni onların başına bekçi göndermedik!
arabic: مَّن يُطِعِ ٱلرَّسُولَ فَقَدۡ أَطَاعَ ٱللَّهَۖ وَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ فَمَآ أَرۡسَلۡنَٰكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ حَفِيظٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man yuṭiʿi al-rasūla faqad aṭāʿa al-laha waman tawallā famā arsalnāka ʿalayhim ḥafīẓan
